participant_1.name: Jonh
participant_1.personality: Confident and dedicated, with a strong passion for sports and an eccentric flair.
participant_1.background: i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Casual and humorous, often finds joy in everyday life and values relationships deeply.
participant_2.background: i'm in the army. i didn't graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i live in canada.
